meanings.definition: A bear, especially a brown bear.
meanings.sent1: The bruin roamed through the forest searching for food.
meanings.sent2: I saw a bruin at the zoo last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The bruin tried to climb a tree but got stuck halfway up!
meanings.sent4: The bruin's strength was as mighty as a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The bruin's fur was a rich shade of brown, blending perfectly with the trees.

meanings.definition: A nickname for a person from Brown University.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a bruin, studying hard at Brown University.
meanings.sent2: The bruin I met at the party was very friendly.
meanings.sent3: I bumped into a bruin from Brown University at the bookstore.
meanings.sent4: The bruin's dedication to their studies was inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The bruin proudly wore their Brown University hoodie around campus.
